title: 357: Internet Warfare
itunes:title: 357: Internet Warfare
description:
Oh, this one is a doozy! Jess is coming off of a bender, Bekah reveals her shocking and disturbing birthday hour, they discuss “dry” seasons in s*x lives and communicating with your partner through them, and then Bekah incites chaos by discussing her internet warfare which leads to The Broads having an honest, serious discussion. It’s a wild ride. Thanks for sticking with us #broadsquad - we love you.
